She also explains how to differentiate between the roles of entrepreneurs and venture capitalists.
Why Entrepreneurs Should Think Big.short_description: Listen to Donna Novitsky talk about ambitious entrepreneurship and learn why you should always think big.

Why Risk is Necessary for Business Growt.long_description: This free online course on why risk is necessary for business growth features Peter Diamandis of the X Prize foundation. He will give you an overview of his path to entrepreneurship and teach you the skills required to make a successful business. You will also learn the importance of following your passion in life. Peter will also discuss where the idea for the creation of the X Prize foundation came from, and more!
Why Risk is Necessary for Business Growt.short_description: Listen to Peter Diamandis of X Prize discuss risk and learn why it can be necessary for the growth of a business.

Wide Area Networks and Networking Servic.long_description: This free online Wide Area Networks and Networking Services and Security course will give you an overview of the services required for a network to function securely and effectively. You will also learn that in computer networking, a network service is an application that provides data storage, manipulation, presentation, and communication via a client-server or peer-to-peer architecture that is based on application layer network protocols.
Wide Area Networks and Networking Servic.short_description: Gain a stronger understanding of Wide Area Network technology and network security with this free online course.

Wind Energy - From Wind Turbines to Grid.long_description: This free online Wind Energy course teaches you how wind power is used to create electrical power with a variety of methods ranging from wind turbines to grid integration. With climate change becoming a serious issue, the use of wind power plants has risen exponentially. This free online course will teach you about how wind energy is harnessed, and how countries around the world can improve their wind energy production.
Wind Energy - From Wind Turbines to Grid.short_description: Learn the importance and uses of wind energy, wind turbines, and grid integration with this free online course.

Windows 10 App Development - Navigation.long_description: This free online Windows 10 App Development course with teach you all about the controls and methods that can be used in Visual Studio to create suitable layouts and navigation for Windows 10 applications. This free course will be of great interest to developers and anyone who wants to know what is involved in creating layouts and navigation for Windows 10 applications.
Windows 10 App Development - Navigation.short_description: Learn how to use layout controls and implement navigation in Visual Studio with this free online app development course.

Winning With Communication - Master Your.long_description: In this free online course, you will learn about how transforming your communication skills will transform your life! It's hard to get even the smallest things done if you can't communicate well. Master communicators enjoy better careers, relationships, happiness and more success! Start the course today and learn how to improve your communication skills.
Winning With Communication - Master Your.short_description: Discover the key principles of communication and how to master the art of communication with this free online course.

Word 2016 - Features and Functionality.long_description: This free online course focuses on five important aspects of Word 2016 with step-by-step demonstrations of how to use the core features and functions in Word 2016. Microsoft Word 2016 is a word processing application that allows you to create a variety of documents, such as letters, resumes, and more. This course will be of great interest to all learners who would like to learn more about the features and functionality of Word 2016.
Word 2016 - Features and Functionality.short_description: Learn the core features and functionality of Microsoft Word 2016 with this free online course.

Working with Students with Special Educa.long_description: This free online course on working with students with special education needs is ideal for teachers of all backgrounds. Children with special needs have different requirements, especially when it comes to classroom learning. Having an in-depth understanding of educational psychology can help those in the field of special education to better fulfill their roles. This course will help you make your working day a little easier and more productive.
Working with Students with Special Educa.short_description: Improve your special education teaching methods with this free introductory special education course.

World History - The Rise of Fascism - Re.long_description: This free online world history course will discuss the rise of fascism as a political movement in mid-20th century Europe. Fascism is a political ideology characterized by authoritarianism and nationalism. This course will teach you about the Nazi party, Adolf Hitler, and how economic chaos in Germany helped propel the party into power. It will also teach you about the build up to the second world war and the division of Europe.
World History - The Rise of Fascism - Re.short_description: Learn about the rise of fascism in the middle of the 20th century and the division of Europe as part of the Cold War.

World History - World War 1 and Its Afte.long_description: This free online course on world history will teach you about World War 1 and its aftermath. World War 1 resulted not only in the death of millions of soldiers and civilians but also in the political collapse of European empires and the beginning of the rise of America as a world power. In this course you will learn about the political alliances between countries in Europe and how they were pitted against Germany and Austro-Hungary.
World History - World War 1 and Its Afte.short_description: Learn why Britain, France, and Russia fought against Germany and Austro-Hungary in World War 1, with this free course.

Writing for Young Readers.long_description: This free online writing course offers new and aspiring writers a solid grounding in writing, editing and publishing. Although the course is aimed towards writing for young readers, it is also a practical foundation in writing, editing and publishing for all audiences. You will learn about using different writing forms and genres; writing structure; developing character, plot, setting, theme and language and professional editing and publishing.
Writing for Young Readers.short_description: Learn how to write and publish stories using character, plot, setting and theme with this free online writing course.

Yoga Exercises - Revised.long_description: In this free online course in yoga exercises will be guided through some really fantastic yoga techniques that can help make your yoga routine that one bit more special. Yoga is an exercise system used by millions of people around the world to gain a healthier physical, mental, and spiritual lifestyle. Dashama, who is an innovator in the field of using yoga for mind and body transformation and healing, is the course publisher.
Yoga Exercises - Revised.short_description: Learn how to improve your physical well-being and your state of calm, with this free online yoga course.

Yoga Exercises for Core Strength and Fle.long_description: This free online yoga exercises course teaches more advanced Yoga techniques for core strength and flexibility. You will learn core exercises that will help fine-tune your body alignment and improve your balance and posture. You will also study poses that strengthen the neck, hips, and lower back and alleviate pain. This course also teaches important breathing techniques such as Breath Pranayama and Bliss Breath for inner calm and stress relief.
Yoga Exercises for Core Strength and Fle.short_description: Learn advanced yoga exercises and breathing techniques for core strength, flexibility, inner calm, and stress relief.

YouTube Marketing: The Five Essential St.long_description:
This free online course explains how YouTube marketing works and shows you how to take advantage of the 'algorithm' to encourage YouTube to reward your videos with views.
Learn how to create, upload, and optimise videos for maximum effectiveness in order to attract views, engagement.
Understand how to create your own YouTube channel and send targeted visitors to your website. You will also find out how to participate in the 'Partner Program'.
YouTube Marketing: The Five Essential St.short_description: How to use YouTube to Generate Free Targeted Traffic – a free online course to boost your engagement

Zika Virus - What You Need To Know.long_description: This free online Zika Virus course teaches you everything you need to know about the disease, and how you can prevent yourself from contracting the virus. You will learn about the symptoms of the Zika Virus, which include fever, rash, joint pain, and conjunctivitis, which regions of the planet harbour infected mosquitoes, the possible dangers for pregnant women, and about the lack of vaccines or medicines for the disease.
Zika Virus - What You Need To Know.short_description: Learn about the Zika virus including its symptoms, health implications, and management, with this free online course.

iOS App Development: Data Persistence wi.long_description: Mobile app development is a fast-growing industry and this free online course will introduce you to one of the key concepts of app development: Data persistence with Core Data. This course will be of interest anyone interested in building iOS apps – so start this course today and give your iOS app development skills a real boost!
iOS App Development: Data Persistence wi.short_description: Learn about how to incorporate data persistence with core data into iOS app development with this free online course.
